description: Got a full day planned on the slopes? Get all-day comfort where it counts in our Ski Targeted Cushion Trickster Print Over the Calf Socks with an original design by Trickster Company to empower Indigenous communities. If staying out longer is your game-plan, these socks provide cushion in all the right areas, plus enhanced durability, breathability, and all-day comfort.
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Trickster Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 29% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane, 3% Polyester
